data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Kushinagar who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kushinagar, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Kushinagar to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.section_summary: On average, 7 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Kushinagar, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Kushinagar who will make disciples who make disciples.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Kushinagar, Uttar Pradesh, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Dadupanthi people.
Father, for those in trouble in the county of Kushinagar prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Kushinagar, Uttar Pradesh, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kushinagar, Uttar Pradesh, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
